name: Kyogre ex
author: Yasuki Watanabe

poke_body.name: Flotation
poke_body.effect: As long as Kyogre ex has 1 Energy or less attached to it, the Retreat Cost for each of your Kyogre ex is 0.

attacks.name: Hydro Shot
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Kyogre ex. Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 70 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
